body:
A first spack package version of the [Ginkgo software](https://github.com/ginkgo-project/ginkgo/) was recently added by @davydden. Since then, we have fixed several problems which were present at the time, and we have released the first version of our software (1.0.0). 
In this PR, I hope to improve the spack Ginkgo package to reflect these changes.

Details:
+ Fix a minor typo in the deal.II package.
+ Version 1.0.0 was released and the master branch tracks
   the latest release.
+ Multiple issues with MacOS have been fixed.
+ The static patch is now unneeded.
+ Add support for building Ginkgo with the full Block Jacobi
   performance (compilation takes a long time, so it's off by
   default).
+ Do not build any documentation, benchmarks, examples
   and tests as they are not used at installation time.
title: Update the Ginkgo package to release 1.0.0
